body.description: A real-time strategy game set in a fantasy world filled with orcs, humans, and other races.

body.description: An action-adventure game where players control the main character, Dante, in his quest to defeat demons.
body.title: Devil May Cry

body.description: A sandbox game where players can build and explore their own worlds.
body.title: Minecraft

body.description: A first-person shooter game set in a dystopian future.
body.title: Cyberpunk 2077

body.description: An action-packed game set in an open world environment.
body.title: Grand Theft Auto V

body.description: An action RPG that combines open world exploration with strategic combat against robotic creatures and other factions in a post-apocalyptic world.
body.title: Horizon Zero Dawn
